items.sentence: Tom will do that later when he isn\'t so busy.
Tom has already been told he needs to do that.
Tom has already been told to leave Mary alone.
Mary was wearing her favorite dress yesterday.
We weren\'t aware that we were being recorded.
We\'ll ask Tom what he thinks when we see him.
Tom will be wasting his money if he buys that.
Tom will learn how to do that sooner or later.
Tom wondered where Mary had spent the weekend.
I can\'t believe you don\'t really like pizza.
